appearances.title: Rep. Ami Bera D-CA : CSPAN3 : January 9, 2026 1:02am-1:31am EST
appearances.snippet: host: stephen, arizona, republican line, you are on but representative ami bera. caller: thank you for your service. i can't believe that someone wants to be in government at this time. it takes a lot of caring. i know a lot of venezuelans. everyone i know would be very happy for the venezuelans that came in here illegally to be sent back. can i make a comment on immigration? when obama was president, he was called the deep order in chief. i work at a dealership where they came and took them out. trump does not have the smaller amount of people to go after that obama did it. the only thing that has changed is the narrative. 8000% higher negativity towards ice. you can go through the internet and find 100 times that a congressman on your side called him gestapo, calling ice gestapo. calling it nazi. that had a lot to do it. did -- to do that. the woman should not have been shot, but people are not obeying these guys. right or wrong? i don't know if he should have pulled the trigger when he did. can sub for the courts to decide. everyone is making up their own mind
